column1: Little Goat Diner////I could look past the weaker parts of the menu if the service was better. But our server was fairly slow
column2: forgot my wife's tea (and then failed to bring cream with the tea)
column3: dropped the check before asking if we wanted dessert
column4: and affected an obnoxious "old timey diner ambience" attitude
column5: calling the girls "dolls" and laughing each time he put down a plate; I have a feeling it was just as unpleasant for him to act that part as it was for us to hear it.
